maqras.text: Inna: "a neeo ma tessawlev d tidep, ne$ ma kecc seg ikeddaben
Oue s teboap iw agi, veggeo asen p, sinna, wexxeo asen, wali acu ara d rren
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, tepwaveggeo iyi d teboap tukyist
Ih, s$uo Sliman. Apan: s yisem n Oebbi Aenin Ipeunun
Ur ssem$waoet ara iman nnwen $uoi, aset ed $uoi, d imvuaen
Tenna: "a yimvebboen, fket ed ooay nnwen af lameo iw. Ur pseyyi$ lameo, siwa garawen
Nnan: "nekwni d imawlan n tezmert, nesaa lemeella tuqsiet. Lameo i kem. Muqel d acu ara d tseyyiv
Tenna: "s tidep, igeldan ssefsaden tamdint ara kecmen. Sdullun imdanen is laali. Akka ay xeddmen
Nek, ad asen azne$ tarzeft, ad aoou$ acu ara d awin imcegaan
Mi tebbwev ar Sliman, inna: "day ad iyi taawnem s terkunt? Ayen i yi Ifka Oebbi, yif ayen i wen Ifka. D kunwi kan i ifeoeen, s terzeft nnwen
U$al $uosen. Ih, a noue $uosen s laaskeo, iwumi ur zmiren. A ten id nessuffe$, syenna, ndellen, d imejiueen
Inna: "a yimvebboen, anwa degwen, ara yi d iawin asgeld is, uqbel a yi d asen d imvuaen
Aafrit si leonun, inna d: "ad ak t id awi$, uqbel ma tekkrev seg umekkan ik. I wayagi, war ccekk, nek d uzmir muman

Inna d bab n tmusni si Tezmamt: "nek ad ak t id awi$, uqbel a pfukkev asmeomec". Mi t iwala irs ed $uoes, inna: "wagi si lfevl n Mass iw, ad iyi ijeooeb ma ad snemmre$, ne$ ma ad jehle$. Win isnemmren, isnemmer kan i iman is. Win ijehl, ihi, Mass iw d Asaay, d Ukyis
Inna: "bedlet as udem usgeld is, a neeo ma tepwanha, ne$ haap seg wid ur nepwanha
Mi d tusa, nnan as: "day am wagi, usgeld inem"? Terra d: "amzun d neppa". "Tusa ya$ d tmusni, uqbel neppat, nuzen
Isoue ip wayen tunez, war Oebbi. Tella, s tidep, seg ugdud ijehliyen

Nnan as: "ekcem ar lbeoo"! Mi t twala, t$il degs aman; tesban ed ifadden is. Inna: "s tidep, d lbeoo ulelluc imzin". Tenna: "a Mass iw! Ih, dense$ iman iw. Akked Sliman, unze$ aS i Oebbi, Mass imavalen
Ni$ Nuzen ed, i Tamud, gmat sen Ualie: "aabdet Oebbi"! Maca, rran snat n trebbuya$, ppemnamarent
Inna: "a yagdud iw! Acimi tep$awalem ar tucmip, uqbel ise$? Lemmer a ppeste$foem Oebbi, ahat aeunu fellawen
Nnan: "tkeeeesev a$, kecc akked wi iddan yidek". Inna: "lfal nnwen ar Oebbi, u kunwi d agdud ara ippuhewwlen
Llan, di temdint, tza iterrasen i issefsaden di tmurt, ur pleqqimen
Nnan: "yyaw a nemmesgal s Oebbi, ard a neevem deg iv fellas, neppa akked twacult is. Sinna, a nini i bab is: ur nelli d inagan n tmen$iwt n tawacult is. Ih, nekwni, d imawlan n tidep
Undin ticeokep, Nundi ticeokep, nitni ur faqen
Wali amek tevoa di tceokep nnsen. Nen$ed iten, nitni, akked ugdud nnsen, meooa
Atnan hudden ixxamen nnsen, ilmend n ddens nnsen. Deg wayagi, war ccekk, assekni i ugdud issnen
Nsellek wid iumnen u llan peezziben
I Lui, mi inna i ugdud is: "teppeddum ar wayen n dir, u kunwi tepwalim
Ih, kunwi teppeddum ar irgazen, teb$am ten, war tilawin. Ih, kunwi d agdud ur nessin
